text:
e="preserve">Aleksandr Timofeyevich Aksinin (, 4 November 1954 – 28 July 2020)) was a Soviet athlete. He won a gold medal winner of the 4 × 100m relay at the 1980 Summer Olympics. He also won a bronze medal at the 1976 Summer Olympics. Aksinin was born in Leningrad.
Aksinin died on 28 July 2020, aged 65.
